name: Jinbe
text: On Play: You may reveal 2 Event cards from your hand: this Character gains Rush during this turn. Then, this Character gains +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: You may reveal 2 Event cards from your hand: this Character gains Rush during this turn. Then, this Character gains +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

powerMod.duration: until the end of your opponent's next turn
